summary:
Please note that this mod is now OBSOLETE - use USKP instead

Changes the broken button in the Yngol Barrow throneroom to a chain. Now you can get out!

Problem description here:
http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim_talk:Yngol_Barrow#yngol_barrow_.28open_gate.29
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE NOTE: This mod is now OBSOLETE; the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch [/url] has fixed the problem; and is the recommended method. I\'m leaving my mod up in case there\'s anybody out there who can\'t or won\'t use USKP for any reason.

Changes the broken button in the Yngol Barrow throneroom to a chain. Now you can get out!

Problem description here:
http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim_talk:Yngol_Barrow#yngol_barrow_.28open_gate.29

Also available on Steam Workshop!
author: OfftheRails
